#summary The navigator.product property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `navigator.product` property returns a string.
  * [BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns `"Gecko"`.
  * [BrowserFamilySafari Safari] returns `"Gecko"`.

This property is read-only.
